General Usage Notes
If possible, use the default implementation of the interface as base page in your project.
If you cannot derive your pages from the default implementation (e.g., because you need to derive from another class), use to implement all methods and properties.

RegisterClientSidePageEventHandler.param: The type of event to register for.
Forms in combination with a unique key that identifies the function.
The name of the Java Script function to be called.

remarks.para: The Java Script function will be called without arguments and a return value will be ignored.
Any script blocks with the same and parameter values are considered duplicates.

RegisterClientSidePageEventHandler.exception: Thrown if the method is called after the OnPreRender method of the base page has been invoked invoked.
